title: Shining Skull / Frontal Brain Cleansing Breath
description: Sit in a comfortable position. Lengthen your spine. Rest your hands on your knees. Close your eyes. Inhale naturally. Forcefully exhale through your nose by actively drawing your belly toward your spine. Keep the rest of your body still. Inhale naturally. Repeat 10 rounds of this breath: exhaling forcefully and inhaling naturally at a medium pace. Then rest for a minute in Corpse. Keep chin parallel to floor Draw belly toward spine for forceful exhalations Do not move shoulders Avoid jerky movements
pose_description: Shining Skull / Frontal Brain Cleansing Breath - KapalabhatiPranayama
